EmailTemplate.name: MBO Call Summary and HP Account Manager Contact (1349191732.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Call Summary and HP Account Manager Contact (1349191732.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Dear Eric , It was a pleasure speaking with you today. I’ve enclosed a few resources that you might find helpful. - Here is a short list of some of our top clients within MBO Access <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Access_Information.pdf>. - In addition, we have an index of recorded Webinars that will comprehensively cover everything to do with working independently. You can see them by going here <http://www.mbopartners.com/resources>. - You can acess our bill rate calculator by going here. <http://www.mbopartners.com/#billrate> - Lastly, you can view all the information we spoke over the phone by going here. <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html> (Please bookmark this page.) Your contact at MBO Partners will be Meghan Parme (copied above.) You can schedule a time to speak with her here <https://my.timedriver.com/SQ7H6>. (As a heads up, she is leaving on Thursday for vacation but she will have a back up while she is out.) Best of luck! Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
